plot: Dave Shealy has searched for the creature known as Skunk Ape for over 40 years of his life. And now the cameras are turned on him in this character piece chronicling the life of a man that believes in something.
title: They Live in Trees
plot_es: Dave Shealy has searched for the creature known as Skunk Ape for over 40 years of his life. And now the cameras are turned on him in this character piece chronicling the life of a man that believes in something.
plot_en: Dave Shealy has searched for the creature known as Skunk Ape for over 40 years of his life. And now the cameras are turned on him in this character piece chronicling the life of a man that believes in something.
